posts.title: Dune
posts.description: Feature adaptation of Frank Herbert's science fiction novel, about the son of a noble family entrusted with the protection of the most valuable asset and most vital element in the galaxy.

posts.title: No time to die
posts.description: No Time to Die is a 2021 spy film and the twenty-fifth in the James Bond series produced by Eon Productions. It stars Daniel Craig in his fifth and final outing as the fictional British MI6 agent James Bond.

posts.title: Eternals
posts.description: The saga of the Eternals, a race of immortal beings who lived on Earth and shaped its history and civilizations.

posts.title: Red Notice
posts.description: An Interpol agent tracks the world's most wanted art thief.
